title: Bihar Heritage Tour 2
overview: Explore the beautiful heritage attractions of Bihar. This tour is designed to give you an immersive experience of Heritage Spot 2.

itinerary.title: Arrival
itinerary.desc: Arrive in Bihar and transfer to your hotel.

itinerary.title: Sightseeing
itinerary.desc: Full day exploring Heritage Spot 2 and nearby areas.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.desc: Breakfast and transfer to the airport/station.
